attributes.action: Pass law to ensure that all foreign drivers and vehicles are made to pay fines, and that their vehicles comply with our laws and regulations, as happens on the Continent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, over £5m is lost each year by foreign drivers not paying speeding and parking tickets alone. Many foreign drivers do not have current licence and insurance, and many HGV drivers do not comply with drivers' hours restrictions, leading to many serious accidents. Most, if not all, foreign registered vehicles do not have "left dipping" headlights, and do not comply with other basic UK vehicle regulations. The Continental police strictly enforce "on the spot" fines and vehicle impounding. Why not here?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
